name: Rocket Booster (juanyfanga)
description:
This is my first game made for "Complete C# Unity Game Developer 3D"  which is a Udemy Course.

Rocket Booster is a platformer game based on the physics of a rocket. You will have to get to the orange platform in order to continue through its 10 different levels. Resolve the puzzles of the game and try to finished it with the least amount of deaths. I dare you to complete the game without dying!

CONTROLS:

SPACE: To thrust.

A and D: To rotate.
